channel.title: Client Problem? NPCs

item.title: Client Problem? NPCs
item.dc:creator: @Jackierox68 Jackierox68
item.description:
@Jackierox68 wrote:

Ok, so I added in a Dark Beast (new from the RSMV thing) and instead of attack it says Tackle and theres a null (dwarf head) under him but it does show him. Can someone help me?

if(i == 2997) { // Dark B34ST aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; // Original NPC data, used to collect default emotes and extra NPC info. Don't change this unless you know what you are doing. class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Collect original NPC data, do not change. class5.anIntArray94 = new int[2]; // Number of models the NPC uses int changedColors = 1; // Number of model colors changed on the NPC class5.anIntArray76 = new int[changedColors]; class5.anIntArray70 = new int[changedColors]; class5.anIntArray76[0] = 61; // Original model color class5.anIntArray70[0] = 926; class5.anIntArray94[1] = 13468; class5.aString65 = "Dark Beast"; class5.anInt61 = 528; class5.aByteArray89 = "A beast that is corrupted by darkness in his soul".getBytes(); }
